blogPost.excerpt: Work faster with parts suppliers from idea to production. Get instant quotes for your designs, source new verified suppliers around the world, get feedback directly from suppliers to avoid mistakes and produce even the most complex parts with minimum delays.
blogPost.body: Work faster with parts suppliers from idea to production. Get instant quotes for your designs, source new verified suppliers around the world, get feedback directly from suppliers to avoid mistakes and produce even the most complex parts with minimum delays.
blogPost.title: Jiga - Build hardware faster
blogPost.author: Yonatan Wolowelsky

localize.description: 从创意到生产，与零部件供应商合作更快。为您的设计获取即时报价，在全球范围内寻找新的经过验证的供应商，直接从供应商处获得反馈，以避免错误，并以最少的延误生产最复杂的零件。
從創意到生產，與零部件供應商合作更快。爲您的設計獲取即時報價，在全球範圍內尋找新的經過驗證的供應商，直接從供應商處獲得反饋，以避免錯誤，並以最少的延誤生產最複雜的零件。

previous.excerpt: An estimate 60% of small businesses closed down due to covid. Now more than ever they need your help. I created some tools and training to teach you how to build a local lead generation business to help out these businesses.
previous.title: Local Lead Game - Learn the local lead generation game & help local businesses

localize.description: 据估计，60%的小企业因为covid而倒闭。现在他们比以往任何时候都更需要你的帮助。我创建了一些工具和培训，教你如何建立一个本地的线索生成业务，以帮助这些企业。
localize.tagline: 学习当地的潜在客户开发游戏，并帮助当地的企业

localize.description: 據估計，60%的小企業因爲covid而倒閉。現在他們比以往任何時候都更需要你的幫助。我創建了一些工具和培訓，教你如何建立一個本地的線索生成業務，以幫助這些企業。
localize.tagline: 學習當地的潛在客戶開發遊戲，並幫助當地的企業

next.excerpt: Create your video once - publish it everywhere. Cut different pieces of content from your video and change the aspect ratio to share them across all your social networks.
next.title: Repurpose Video Content - Cherry-pick highlights & turn them into standalone videos 🍒

localize.description: 一次性创建您的视频 - 到处发布。从您的视频中剪切不同的内容，并改变长宽比，以便在您的所有社交网络上分享它们。
localize.tagline: 挑选亮点并将其转化为独立的视频 🍒。

localize.description: 一次性創建您的視頻 - 到處發佈。從您的視頻中剪切不同的內容，並改變長寬比，以便在您的所有社交網絡上分享它們。
localize.tagline: 挑選亮點並將其轉化爲獨立的視頻 🍒。
